description: Power to manipulate all manners of bugs.
The ability to shoot golden balls out of one's body.
The ability to control Earth elements like dirt and rocks.
The ability to mimic anything you touch.
Wounds will heal at an advanced rate, making you nearly unkillable.
The ability to come back from the dead.
Use your mind to read thoughts and communicate with others.
The ability to generate pheromones that affect the behavior of others.
The ability to concentrate psychic energy into an explosion.
Transform sound frequencies into forms of light.
The ability to manfiest powers from body art.
The abilitiy to live forever.
The ability to create a force field around anything, including yourself.
The ability to breathe underwater.
The ability to create multiple versions of yourself at once.
Expert marksmenship, always able to hit your target.
Controlling magnetic fields and thus, metals.
The ability to manipulate the gravitational pull of the Earth.
The ability to fully comprehend the moods and emotions of others.
Move at great speeds.
Control over ice and/or snow.
The ability to turn one's flatuence into an explosive.
The ability to conjure Satan and his skills.
The ability to create multiples of an object of one's choosing.
The ability to stretch one's body like rubber.
The ability to see what's going to happen before it happens.
Transporting oneself from one place to another.
The abilitiy to immobilize your opponent's motor functions temporarily.
Move objects and people with your mind.
An extended piece of skeleton that emerges from the knuckles to act as claws.
You are impossible to move.
Draw on the various abilities of animalkind.
The ability to remove your arms and legs at will.
A superhuman capacity to retain information.
Creating bolts of lightning or other forms of electrical discharge.
The ability to comprehend any and all languages.
Remain unseen by the naked eye.
The ability to consume all matter in any form.
The ability to alter the size of your body.
Having an open line of communication with the deceased.
The ability to walk through solid objects.
A sentient piece of land.
The ability to take control of someone else's body.
Being capable of relocating the major organs within your body.
The ability to speak with and take command of animalkind.
The ability to turn yourself into water.
The ability to freeze time at any given moment.
Manipulation of the climate, causing wind, rain, hail, lightning, tornadoes, etc.
The ability to control your metaphysical energies.
The ability to reanimate the deceased.
Transform sound frequencies into forms of light.
A superhuman capacity to retain information.
The ability to turn one's flatuence into an explosive.
Control over fire.
A powerful emmission of concussive force in the form of an energy blast.
